description.value:
Your lethal unarmed attacks leave bloody gouges or cause severe internal bleeding. When you critically hit with a Strike using an unarmed attack that isn't nonlethal, the target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success].

This can be because you're taking the penalty to use a fist for a lethal attack or because you have an unarmed attack without the nonlethal trait due to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Iron Fists]{Iron Fists}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Tusks (Orc)]{Tusks}, or a similar ability.
